titles.title: Stand back, O earth, I'm coming forth.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Stand back, O earth, I'm coming forth.
Stand back, O earth, I'm coming forth.
There is no way you can hold me down.
Stand back, O earth, I'm coming forth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This mortal body was sown in corruption,
Raised in incorruption; Sown in dishonor,
Raised in glory; sown in weakness, raised
In power in you and me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
This resurrection was sown a body that was natural,
And raised a body that is spiritual.
As we have borne this earthly image,
We will bear the heavenly.
